definitions.title: f.,
definitions.body: two (so in Aram. dialects generally (note Nab. f. [[תרתין]] over ag. Palm [[תרתן]] Lzb:388); v. Philippi:ZMG xxxii (1878), 21 ff.;

definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: only cstr. in [[תִּרֵי עֲשַׂר]] twelve, after

definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: pl. ´[[שְׁנִין שִׁתִּין וְת]]: Da 6:1 years sixty and two; = ord., [[שְׁנַת תַּרְתֵּין]] Da 4:24 second year.
